thread.title: Man jailed after three revolvers and two handguns found hidden in his home
thread.title_full: Man jailed after three revolvers and two handguns found hidden in his home

author: Rebecca Day
title: Man jailed after three revolvers and two handguns found hidden in his home
text:
Man jailed after three revolvers and two handguns found hidden in his home Officers also found Spice and MDMA when they searched John Maneely's house in south Manchester Share John Maneely and some of the weapons found at his home Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
This stash of guns was discovered along with Spice and other drugs at a home in south Manchester . 
John Maneely has been locked up after police seized the haul during a raid on his Levenshulme address back in November. 
Officers from the Xcalibre Task Force and Challenger Manchester recovered three revolvers, two other handguns, a silencer and ammunition. They also found the synthetic cannabis known as Spice, as well as class A party drug MDMA (ecstasy), mobile phones and sim cards. 
Maneely was arrested and remanded in custody. A revolver seized at John Maneely's home 
The 37-year-old, of Anchor Close, Levenshulme, pleaded guilty to five counts of possession of a prohibited weapon, possession of ammunition, possession with intent to supply a psychoactive substance and possession of MDMA. Read More 
He was sentenced to seven years and four months in prison at Manchester Crown Court on Wednesday, February 22. A revolver seized at John Maneely's home 
Det Sgt Patrick Goodrich, of GMP ’s Xcalibre Task Force, said: “In November 2016 we discovered a plethora of weapons at Maneely’s home that could be used with fatal consequences, and today he has been jailed. 
“Today’s outcome is a result of hard work by the team at Xcalibre Task Force and support from the public and our fight against guns and drugs will not stop.” Like us on Facebook
